articles.author: Theto Mahlakoana
articles.title: Nigeria backs SA in criticism of travel bans over Omicron COVID variant - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Several countries including the UK, US and Rwanda have moved to ban southern Africans from travelling to their shores after scientists in South Africa identified the new variant which has since been found in several European countries as well.
